articles.description: The LaLiga giants were heavily linked with the Frenchman last summer, but no move was finalised as the club instead signed Luis Suarez from Barcelona to bolster their attack.
articles.content:
Atletico Madrid are reportedly preparing to revisit their pursuit of Arsenal striker Alexandre Lacazette.
The LaLiga giants were heavily linked with the Frenchman last summer, but no move was finali… [+2049 chars]

articles.description: Former UFC featherweight champion Max Holloway joins Jon Anik backstage after his dominant performance in the main event of Fight Island 7.
